name: Dayo Tayo
description:
Description:

Dayo Tayo is a simple, minigame-rush style game that focuses on Lester, a student moving to the city in order to get a new home for his family. Along the way, he ends up daydreaming the is experiences in his time in the province. The minigames will be take form of the daydreams or memories he had. The mechanics would take form in an endurance style format with each minigame being different and would be controlled using the touch screen. The minigames would last briefly and have simple goals within them.

P.S The game is underdeveloped and the updated files are missing. will update the link as soon as possible.

Controls:
  1. Left Mouse Button - Interact
